topRatedMovies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
topRatedMovies.Writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
topRatedMovies.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
topRatedMovies.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
topRatedMovies.Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 30 nominations.

topRatedMovies.Title: The Godfather
topRatedMovies.Writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay), Mario Puzo (novel)
topRatedMovies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard S. Castellano
topRatedMovies.Plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

topRatedMovies.Title: The Godfather: Part II
topRatedMovies.Writer: Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay), Mario Puzo (screenplay), Mario Puzo (novel)
topRatedMovies.Actors: Al Pacino, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro
topRatedMovies.Plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

topRatedMovies.Title: The Dark Knight
topRatedMovies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
topRatedMovies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
topRatedMovies.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

topRatedMovies.Title: 12 Angry Men
topRatedMovies.Actors: Martin Balsam, John Fiedler, Lee J. Cobb, E.G. Marshall
topRatedMovies.Plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
topRatedMovies.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 8 nominations.
